Document.Focus: Choking - adult or child over 1 year

Synonyms.Synonym: Abdominal thrusts - adult or child over 1 year
Heimlich maneuver - adult or child over 1 year: Choking - back blows - adult or child over 1 year

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Choking - adult or child over 1 year
QAPair.Answer: Choking is when someone is having a very hard time breathing because food, a toy, or other object is blocking the throat or windpipe (airway). A choking person's airway may be blocked so that not enough oxygen reaches the lungs. Without oxygen, brain damage can occur in as little as 4 minutes. Rapid first aid for choking can save a person's life.
